rationale: 'take a toll' is an idiom, not an intensified risk-adjective.
statement_text: More than 1.3 million chickens are being slaughtered on an Ohio egg farm as the bird flu continues to take a toll on the industry.

rationale: The segment uses the high-potency verb 'slaughtered' to describe the impact on chickens.
statement_text: More than 1.3 million chickens are being slaughtered on an Ohio egg farm as the bird flu continues to take a toll on the industry.
